item.description: arXiv:2512.11849v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Automated document layout analysis remains a major challenge for low-resource, non-Latin scripts. Khmer is a language spoken daily by over 17 million people in Cambodia, receiving little attention in the development of document AI tools. item.title: Active Inference with Reusable State-Dependent Value Profiles
